max_function_mcc: Cyclomatic complexity of most complex function
functions_per_class: Average number of functions per class
average_statements_per_function: Average number of statements per function
unary: Assigns always the value 1 to this dimension
MEAN: Shows mean values as height metric accumulated over all loaded maps
MEDIAN: Shows median values as height metric accumulated over all loaded maps
MAX: Shows maximum values as height metric accumulated over all loaded maps
MIN: Shows minimum values as height metric accumulated over all loaded maps
FASHION: Shows fashion values as height metric accumulated over all loaded maps
